name: dropbox
title: Dropbox
description: Manage your files and folders effortlessly.

id.description: The file's ID. This could be a unique identifier from the external service, or a relative or absolute path, so long as it's unique.

name.description: The file's name. This will be displayed in the Botpress UI and be used as the file's name on Files API."

parentId.description: The parent folder ID. Leave empty if the file is in the root folder.

absolutePath.description: The full path of the file

sizeInBytes.description: The file size in bytes, if available

lastModifiedDate.description: The last modified date of the file, if available

contentHash.description: The hash of the file content, or version/revision number, if available

listItemsInFolder.title: List items in a folder
listItemsInFolder.description: List files and folders in dropbox within a directory

path.description: The folder's path. Leave empty to list the contents of the root folder

nextToken.description: The cursor to continue the pagination

name.description: The name of the item, including extension.

path.description: The path to the item in the user's Dropbox.

webUrl.description: The URL to view the item on the Dropbox website.

isDeleted.description: Whether the item has been deleted.

isShared.description: Whether the item is shared with other users.

symlinkTarget.description: The target of the symlink, if the file is a symlink

modifiedAt.description: The date and time the file was last modified, formatted as an ISO 8601 timestamp.
